amendment.description: Amendment declaires veterans who are severely disabled shall be given special consideration as agencies implement contracting regulations; set forth certain standards for business integrity that are required for participation in federal contracting programs; and would clarify the implementation of the women's procurement program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-407 to establish that those veterans who are severely disabled shall be given special consideration as agencies implement contracting regulations; set forth certain standards for business integrity that are required for participation in federal contracting programs; and would clarify the implementation of the women's procurement program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
